org.spf4j.concurrent

Class RetryExecutor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.concurrent.RetryExecutor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, ExecutorService

    public class RetryExecutor<T>
extends Object
implements ExecutorService
    Executor that will execute Callables with retry. This executor cannot be used inside a Completion service. as such it allow
    Author:
    zoly
